菤字的基本解释

菤
juǎn
〔菤耳〕同“卷耳”，即“苍耳”，一种直立草本植物，可入药。

菤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juǎn］
［《廣韻》居轉切，上獮，見。］
见“菤耳”、“菤葹”。

菤字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　菤； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1038第26
〔古文〕?【唐韻】居轉切【集韻】古轉切，?音卷。【爾雅·釋草】菤耳，苓耳。詳苓字註。本作卷。【詩·周南】采采卷耳。

菤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
菤字的起名意思

暂无。

菤
Basic explanation of words
菤
juǎn
〔菤耳〕Same as "roll ears", that is, "xanthium", a kind of erect herb, can be used as medicine.
菤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juǎn］
["Guangyun" is in turn and cut, go up, see you. ]
See "菤 Er", "菤葹".
菤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　菤; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1038 Page 26
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Ju Zhuan cut [Ji Yun] Ancient Zhuan cut, sound volume. 【Erya·Shuicao】Wan'er, Ling'er. Detailed Ling words note. This is a volume. [Poetry·Zhou Nan] Picking and rolling ears.
菤

Nothing.
juǎn
только в сочетаниях
